List of packages included in `twinetverse`.

## rtweet 

<img src="http://rtweet.info/reference/figures/logo.png" style="max-height:150px;"/>

`rtweet` is an R client for accessing Twitterâ€™s REST and stream APIs. All you need to **collect** tweets is a Twitter account and you can be up in running in minutes! Check out the thorough documentation [website](http://rtweet.info/).

## graphTweets 

<img src="http://graphtweets.john-coene.com/logo.png" style="max-height:150px;"/>

`graphTweets` is an R package to **build** networks of Twitter interactions. Check the [website](http://graphtweets.john-coene.com/) for examples of static and dynamic networks.

## sigmajs 

<img src="http://sigmajs.john-coene.com/reference/figures/logo.png" style="max-height:150px;"/>

`sigmajs` lets you create and **visualise** networks in an interactive way, the package is highly configurable and shiny-centric to leverage sigma.js' great many methods. Check the [website](http://sigmajs.john-coene.com/) for examples and complete documentation.
